title: How to Make Homemade Coffee Bread

steps.headline: Dissolve yeast in a large bowl of warm water.
Stir in 4 eggs, cardamom, milk, sugar, salt and 2 cups of flour.
steps.description: Continue to stir until the dough is smooth.

steps.headline: Add 3 cups of flour and continue mixing.
Add 2-3 more cups of flour until the dough is stiff.
Take the dough out and place it on a floured bread board.
steps.description: Cover it with a bowl. Let it rest for 15 minutes.

steps.headline: Knead (massage the dough with your hands) dough for about 8-10 minutes until it is smooth.
steps.description: Place the dough in a lightly greased bowl and cover it with a plastic wrap. Allow it to rise for 1-2 hours (until it has doubled in size).

steps.headline: Take the dough out and punch it down.
steps.description: Leave the dough to rise again until it has doubled in size (30 minutes to 1 hour).

steps.headline: Place the dough out on a floured board.
Roll each part into 18 inch (45.7 cm)-long strands.
Braid the 3 strands together to form 1 braid.
steps.description: Each part should make one braid so you should end up with 3 braids.

steps.headline: Let the braids rest for 20-30 minutes until they are puffy.
Brush the braids with beaten egg.
steps.description: Sprinkle them with sugar for flavoring and garnish.

steps.headline: Bake for 20-30 minutes until the braids are a golden brown.
steps.description: Remove from the oven and allow to cool before serving.

text: Making the Bread Dough Dissolve yeast in a large bowl of warm water.  Stir in 4 eggs, cardamom, milk, sugar, salt and 2 cups of flour. Continue to stir until the dough is smooth. Add 3 cups of flour and continue mixing.  Add the melted butter.  Add 2-3 more cups of flour until the dough is stiff.  Take the dough out and place it on a floured bread board. Cover it with a bowl. Let it rest for 15 minutes. Knead (massage the dough with your hands) dough for about 8-10 minutes until it is smooth. Place the dough in a lightly greased bowl and cover it with a plastic wrap. Allow it to rise for 1-2 hours (until it has doubled in size). Take the dough out and punch it down. Leave the dough to rise again until it has doubled in size (30 minutes to 1 hour). Braiding the Bread Dough Place the dough out on a floured board. Divide it into 3 parts. Roll each part into 18 inch (45.7 cm)-long strands.  Braid the 3 strands together to form 1 braid. Each part should make one braid so you should end up with 3 braids. Let the braids rest for 20-30 minutes until they are puffy.  Baking the Bread Braids Brush the braids with beaten egg. Sprinkle them with sugar for flavoring and garnish. Bake for 20-30 minutes until the braids are a golden brown. Remove from the oven and allow to cool before serving.
